news.image_caption: Building a Better Solution for Our Planet
news.content:
Today‚Äôs Internet consumes approximately 10% of the world‚Äôs energy. This is not acceptable.

So, how to fix this? Start from scratch. Attack the root problems. Build a new infrastructure. Go peer-to-peer. Reduce complexity. Improve efficiency. Work with like-minded partners. No one is taking this approach, apart from ThreeFold.

Learn more about how ThreeFold is building a better solution for our üåé.

And read about our why.

Big update to share in the coming weeks about how ThreeFold is pushing even further in this direction!

We commend all projects and individuals out there working to provide more sustainable solutions and systems for the planet. üôè
news.excerpt: Our planet needs real solutions, not just a band aid approach.

next.title: Update on the Binance Smart Chain Integration
next.excerpt: We are happy to update that the BSC integration is going just as planned and next week, TFT will be available there.
